title: Joe Ganim
deleted: In the weeks to follow taking his oath of office, Mayor Ganim released a video addressing the attack that gained national attention in a Rockland County town where five people were stabbed in a rabbi’s home.  As he condemned the actions, he also assured increased public safety at places of worship in the City of Bridgeport.   “Attacks on houses of worship, individuals, or families while in prayer is unacceptable and will not be tolerated in the City of Bridgeport,” Ganim stated on December 30, 2019.

Global entertainer Marc Anthony performed at the Webster Bank Arena, Bridgeport on February 14, 2019.  In a special presentation for the entertainer, Mayor Ganim presented Marc Anthony with a Key to the City.
